aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I create innovative products that will make users' experiences easier with my work in mobile development and in the field. I actively develop mobile applications with Dart/Flutter and write websites with React.js. I work with MongoDB and SQLite as databases and do backend development with Node.js/Express.js.

myWorks.title: My Works
myWorks.description: Here you can view the projects I have worked on before and the new projects I am developing. Each one is carefully crafted, customer-focused and visually appealing.

home.title: Hi, I am Hikmet Melik FIRAT
home.paragraph: As a passionate Software Engineer with expertise in both mobile and web development, I am dedicated to building innovative digital solutions that seamlessly integrate functionality and user experience. My focus is on designing and developing scalable applications that meet both business needs and end-user expectations.

contactMe.title: Contact Me
contactMe.description: Interested in working together or have a question? Feel free to reach out. I'm here to help you turn your ideas into amazing digital realities. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

projects.name: Customer App
projects.description: Customer App project for Argekip Bilisim Teknolojileri Internship. Users can make CRUD operations on customers without any state management methods. App communicate with my backend service which is Customer Backend. Used technologies: Dart/Flutter.

projects.name: Customer Backend
projects.description: Customer Backend project for Argekip Bilisim Teknolojileri Internship. Backend service for Customer App with Typescript. Free to use for simple operations. Used technologies: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB.

projects.name: Ballsquad Technical Test Solution
projects.description: Ballsquad Technical Test Solution project for Ballsquad Erasmus+ Internship. I wrote a project that allows me to use Bloc/Cubit and Dio packages with Flutter and display authors on the screen by sending a request to 'https://openlibrary.org', and then display the author's details when the relevant author is clicked. Used technologies and packages: Dart/Flutter, Bloc/Cubit, Dio.

projects.name: Voyagist App
projects.description: Ondokuz Mayis University Computer Engineering graduation project. The aim of this project is to prevent users from doing site research one by one to visit historical places in a city. The application draws a route with historical places in the city where the user is located and saves users time. Used technologies: Dart/Flutter, Node.js/Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase, Sengrid Email API,
